boardgame.name: Deep Sea Adventure
Tiefseeabenteuer
Предельное погружение
海底探険
해저탐험
boardgame.description: From the rulebook:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;A group of poor explorers hoping to get rich quickly heads out to recover treasures from some undersea ruins. They're all rivals, but their budgets force them all to share a single rented submarine. In the rented submarine, they all have to share a single tank of air, as well. If they don't get back to the sub before they run out of air, they'll drop all their treasure. Now it's time to see who can bring home the greatest riches._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Game Objective_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The game takes place over 3 rounds, and the player to gain the most points over the 3 rounds is the winner. In order to gain points, you must bring the most ruins chips back to the submarine. You can only return to the submarine once per round, and you cannot progress more after returning. You cannot return to the submarine without bringing any ruins chips._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Turn Progression_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;On their turns, players conduct steps 1-4 listed below. Players take turns, going clockwise around the board, and the round ends when all players have returned to the submarine, or if the air runs out at the beginning of someone's turn._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;1) Declare if you will turn back or not._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;2) Reduce air._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;3) Roll the dice and advance your game piece._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;4) Search. (When you have stopped moving, select one of A-C below)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; A) Do nothing._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; B) Pick up ruins chip._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; C) Place a ruins chip._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

A very entertaining push-your-luck game. Players are divers trying to pick up treasures and get back to the submarine before their air runs out. It_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s great fun. The price shown is for UK/EU purchasers (and includes VAT). For purchasers outside the EU, the price is £12.50 (net of UK tax) - note that the purchaser is responsible for paying any duty or tax due on import to their country. I charge shipping at cost, as follows. UK addresses: £2.79 (myHermes, takes 2-3 working days, tracked) Other EU countries: £4.92 (Air mail, takes 1 week or so, not tracked) Europe outside the EU: £4.10 (Air mail, takes 1 week or so, not tracked) Australasia: £5.15 (Air mail, takes 1 week or so, not tracked) USA, Canada _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; elsewhere: £5.60 (Air mail, takes 1 week or so, not tracked)
